title: Build a Useful Mini Sentence in Finnish: Monelta ... 🕦 #2

media:group.media:title: Build a Useful Mini Sentence in Finnish: Monelta ... 🕦 #2
media:group.media:description:
In this video lesson we will go over the short and simple start of a sentence "monelta.." which can be built upon to create loads of different small sentences in Finnish!

Summary📝
- Monelta = at what time
- Moneltako = at what time (just has the questions ending -ko/kö at the end
- Mihin aikaan = at what time
For example: 
- Monelta koulu alkaa? = At what time does school start?
- Monelta koulu loppuu = At what time does school end?
- Monelta mun pitää olla siellä = At what time do I have to be there?
- Monelta bussi lähtee? = At what time does the bus leave?
- Monelta syödään? = At what time will we eat?
